item.title: Week 1: Jupyterlite
item.description: üëãüèª Hi! Let’s do some coding. The interface below accepts python code. Try copying and pasting this: text = "Oh yeah, digital archaeology!" print(text) into the gray box at the bottom of the interface below. Then, hit shift+enter while your cursor is in the box: Now try this: one = 1 two = 2 print(one + two) See how easy that was? You just entered some python code into a coding environment powered by a version of the Python language.
